examples: I had a phone call from a prospective client today.
Hoy recibí una llamada telefónica de un posible cliente.
They are worried about prospective changes in the law.
Están preocupados por posibles cambios en la ley.
On learning of a prospective sale, the lawyer should call the client as soon as possible.
Al enterarse de una posible venta, el abogado debe llamar al cliente lo antes posible.
